rows.label: qst702202_msg0001
rows.name:
Now this is what I call
a real predicament...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0002
rows.name: It looks pretty vicious...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0003
rows.name:
Did the boy really enter its den...?
I'm impressed he left alive at all...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0004
rows.name:
Vez was born under a lucky star.
The manor is full of anecdotes about
things like this.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0005
rows.name:
He's a forthright man, he wouldn't
lie about this. If he says he went in,
I have no reason to disbelieve him.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0006
rows.name:
You seem awfully calm about this.
What'll you do if we can't get the
key back?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0007
rows.name:
Eh. We'll cross that bridge when we
get there.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0008
rows.name:
Anyway, the things that matter the
most aren't inside the vault.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0009
rows.name: Oh really?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0010
rows.name:
I know where you're going with that,
but I'm sure there are still plenty of
things in there that do matter a bit!

rows.label: qst702202_msg0011
rows.name: And I'm not letting you lose that!

rows.label: qst702202_msg0012
rows.name: Thank you Laura.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0013
rows.name:
Looks like it's still upset about our
friend wandering into its den.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0014
rows.name: We'll have to draw it away somehow...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0015
rows.name: ...Or defeat it where it stands.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0016
rows.name:
Those seem to be the only choices.
Well, in that case...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0101
rows.name: What shall we do about the Feris?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0102
rows.name: Draw it away with food.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0103
rows.name: Defeat it here and now.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0201
rows.name:
Say we did want to lure it away...
What could we use?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0202
rows.name: Someone could act as a decoy.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0203
rows.name:
Uh...
Why are you looking at me like that?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0204
rows.name: Let's maybe just use food.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0205
rows.name:
We could take down some Urbs Armus.
Some should be grazing nearby.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0206
rows.name:
Ah, brilliant.
They most likely form part of its diet
anyway, so it won't look suspicious.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0207
rows.name: You've a good head on your shoulders.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0208
rows.name:
You know we're not mercenaries
because of our looks, right?

rows.label: qst702202_msg0209
rows.name:
Though I never thought this would be
how we'd use the experience...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0210
rows.name:
Urbs Armus, right?
Fine, let's get this over with...

rows.label: qst702202_msg0301
rows.name:
I'm afraid more people might get
attacked by this beast... We should
take it down just in case.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0302
rows.name: You make a good point.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0303
rows.name: Don't overdo it, Laura

rows.label: qst702202_msg0304
rows.name: Don't worry, I know my limits.

rows.label: qst702202_msg0305
rows.name: OK then. It's go time!
